7e88b581-ee88-4e5c-b354-ae32303da1dc.name: Combat Reflexes
7e88b581-ee88-4e5c-b354-ae32303da1dc.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

36c8e41f-de9f-4c67-ac56-b9db0c1825de.name: Fit
36c8e41f-de9f-4c67-ac56-b9db0c1825de.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

49a9f292-bc21-4cb6-9d40-4f24ce5fd356.name: Fit, Very
49a9f292-bc21-4cb6-9d40-4f24ce5fd356.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

f8b76fb6-aa64-421b-9014-cbd620e8e207.name: Off-Hand Weapon Training (@Weapon@)
f8b76fb6-aa64-421b-9014-cbd620e8e207.notes: Replaces equal-named technique on p. B232

1bd003bb-f193-4d01-82cb-f9566b548a9e.name: Weapon Bond
1bd003bb-f193-4d01-82cb-f9566b548a9e.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

9ed0c835-cf09-48b9-b35c-b8fb81451b5b.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

4589db9d-62da-42fb-ba9f-87e2c9a6b094.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

a15dfb14-4199-4917-a398-c0e9eae3d84a.name: Legal Enforcement Powers (@Federal or Secret Service@)

9e8035dd-7bbc-4d83-a777-ad36377e3608.name: Luck, Extraordinary
9e8035dd-7bbc-4d83-a777-ad36377e3608.notes: Usable once per 30 minutes of play

8208655a-d925-434c-b43e-391f860bf2f8.name: Easy to Hit
8208655a-d925-434c-b43e-391f860bf2f8.notes: Others can target your eyes at only -6 to hit

7ac05bb7-8cd4-4829-b529-bd4aa5ad5916.name: Luck
7ac05bb7-8cd4-4829-b529-bd4aa5ad5916.notes: Usable once per hour of play

05e775c2-7451-430f-a257-483825aa74e7.name: Choose four
05e775c2-7451-430f-a257-483825aa74e7.notes: Or three, and raise one of these or Acrobatics, Stealth, or an unarmed combat skill by a level.

60566f68-59f2-4a98-adae-328d713950d1.name: Judo
60566f68-59f2-4a98-adae-328d713950d1.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.

22a66752-8293-40fb-807e-d617b40bcb3e.name: Choose six
22a66752-8293-40fb-807e-d617b40bcb3e.notes: Or five, and raise one of them, or Climbing, Forced Entry, or Jumping by a level.

e8bd7d46-4a4f-4648-9f34-4b2f0f78da97.name: Choose 18 points
e8bd7d46-4a4f-4648-9f34-4b2f0f78da97.notes: Either two or six points may be used to level-up one of these skills.

4567dd35-799f-4734-8d45-e4c947cd22fd.name: Intelligence
4567dd35-799f-4734-8d45-e4c947cd22fd.notes: Choose 20 points. Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

6d159548-b491-4876-ae6c-c6c974a7f3e6.name: Choose 16 points
6d159548-b491-4876-ae6c-c6c974a7f3e6.notes: Either two or six of those points may be used to increase one of these skills by one or two levels.

39316583-a114-487e-8bb4-c1d446b19954.name: Choose 18 points
39316583-a114-487e-8bb4-c1d446b19954.notes: Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

4cbbb4c4-d1ef-415d-b4c7-e2131862b56a.name: Security
4cbbb4c4-d1ef-415d-b4c7-e2131862b56a.notes: Choose 20 points. Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.
